website_summaries.verdict: Large pack of quality, reusable bags at a bargain price point.
pros: Woven plastic bags are durable and lightweight
Pack of 8 sits at a low price point
Bags are comfortable to the touch, not scratchy
23.5 x 40 inch size is ideal for kids and adults
cons: White bags get dirty quickly when used outdoors

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make sure i made the right purchase. I read the other reviews and I must say the other raters were absolutely right. These grown men used it without worry abiut whether it was going to break or not. It is a def for thr next party!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy L Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy potato sacks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter's backyard party. It was a Kids vs. Parents event. It was a great buy for us. We all had so much fun with these potato sacks. The bags are still in perfect condition after being used by over 30 people including adults. I loved that the seller sent me the rules and the different games that could be played with the sacks. I highly recommend these potato sacks for anyone considering this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My 250 pound kudunkadunk put it to the test !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a family camping trip. OMG it was so much fun. The whole family had races. They are extremely durable, I'm a 250 pound dinosaur and I hop my but around these for hours not a single tear. I'm impressed. Great price and well worth 5 star which I dont do often.
customer_reviews.author: LONG

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed using them.
customer_reviews.text: The braided nylon sacks worked perfectly and we will use them again at the next birthday party. Everyone had a good time using them. I've added a picture of my son-in-law with my granddaughter cheating in the sack race.
customer_reviews.author: LHarrison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have used these several times now for children church games and they are 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: These sacks are very durable. They are made of a tarp-like material. The one thing to know is that they are pretty big. I bought them for my 5 year old's birthday party to do a sack race and they came up really high for the kids. But, they were able to use them and have a lot of fun. They are still in great shape and will be saved/reused. Also, they are less expensive than pillow cases, which would be ruined with grass stains at the end of the race.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter's 7th bday luau party. Big hit! The kids played it for hours. I had the kids take their shoes off, seemed easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: these were abused for an hour or so and they held up nicely. I folded them and put them aside for ...
customer_reviews.text: used these with 10-12 year olds. these were abused for an hour or so and they held up nicely. I folded them and put them aside for another day.
customer_reviews.author: VIKTORIA ANANIKIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for birthday parties
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy for an eight-year, boy's birthday party. When you have a group of about 10 boys :( note that being prepared is a good thing. This was a hit for about 30 mins...but it got us through the 2-hour party with cake and presents, without having to call our homeowners insurers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rapsey

customer_reviews.title: Held up great for adult use
customer_reviews.text: The bags were purchased for an adult field day event and, even with some seriously hard usage, not one bag broke or tore! They were a little snug for the larger adults, but worked great and would absolutely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Elise MacBello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome racing game sacks!
customer_reviews.text: These sack race bags were a hit! We had kids ages 3-8 playing but I'm sure a full grown adult would fit it one as well! The bags were thin enough for a little one to easily hold as they hopped, not hard or bulky. Very good quality. They did two races total and not a single sack tore. Kids loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Bertha B

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: My family reunion is coming up and i am planning a bunch of games for adults/kids. So when i saw these and how great the reviews were i had to get them to try. They look and feel very sturdy, cant wait to try them out. Ill update after our reunion.
customer_reviews.author: Mallary

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase fun guaranteed for all!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday our Explorers had Field day, I knew these would be so much fun! The laughter never stopped! The sacks were extremely durable, with 16 kids getting in & out during the relay race no damages at all! Definitely a great addition to our Summer camp equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: no issues with this product at all. will def use once again. Great customer service and great product to bring back all those memories that we all had as children growing up. Now I'm excited to start this tradition with my growing family.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a sack race
customer_reviews.text: It’s nothing like having a good ol sack race... kids love it. Great quality bag but they held up pretty well. A few took a beating but they are still useable.

customer_reviews.title: Great party game

product_meta.title: 8 Pack - Durable Potato Sack Race Bags, No Weird Burlap Odors or Messy Fibers, Great for Kids and Adults, 23.5" x 41" Tough Interwoven Plastic, Birthday Party and Outdoor Games, Gunny Sack Races
feature_bullets: ✅ AWESOME GAME FOR ANY EVENT: Our Potato Sack Race Bags will make for a great and fun event. Use our 8-pack of race bags for birthday party games, gunny sack races, field day games, family reunion games, picnic games, or even corporate event games.

✅ HEAVY-DUTY QUALITY: Our Potato Sack Race Bags are made of very strong interwoven plastic fabric which makes them super durable and great for repeated use. They will not have any problems holding up to big strong adult usage!

✅ GREAT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS: These bags are 41" x 23.5" which makes them a great size for even adults to enjoy without issues. Comes up to the waist of a 6-foot person and can be easily folded down for very small children or toddlers.
✅ NO TOXIC BURLAP ODORS: Burlap bags have a kerosene type odor that will linger on your hands and clothing and will remain even after airing them out for a while.
✅ NO MESSY BURLAP FIBERS: Burlap sheds a lot leaving small fibers all over clothing. Not ideal if you still want to look good after racing!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars358 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
